reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater trendy, soft, and comfortable, with no itchy feeling, and appreciate its perfect fit and great color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soft, trendy, affordable sweater - especially if you're tall!
items.body: I am 6'1" and this is ACTUALLY LONG ENOUGH. I only sized up one size and the sleeves and torso are both long enough. It is also extremely wearable because it is NOT ITCHY at all. I get so many compliments on my sweater every time I wear it. I recommend this for everyone - great value for the money, insanely good quality and very pretty! Just buy it in multiple colors! Read more
items.author: Melissa Lynn Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Purchase!
items.body: This sweater is darling! The fabric is soft and a very nice thickness. It is oversized but not too big. It’s nice quality for the price. It can be worn with skirts, jeans or even leggings. I hand wash and lay flat to dry. It washes well. I would recommend!! Read more
items.author: Lisa Lambert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fashionable and cozy
items.body: I loooooove this sweater! It’s soft, warm and really cute! I now have the brown, red and light blue one! I got an XL perfect for me to wash and fully dry….it comes out of the drier perfect and ready to wear! Get it! Read more
items.author: Kari L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars not good for pregnant bumps
items.body: This sweater is very cute, perfect for fall and very fun. I returned it due to the fact that I was hoping it would be very oversized and fit over my pregnant belly, but instead it hugged it. It will be perfectly oversized for women who are not largely pregnant. Material was thick and nice for a sweater. I wouldn't say it was overly soft, I would say it maybe had a rougher texture to it. I think this would be perfect fit for the right person, just didn't work out for me. Read more
items.author: Ashley Long

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super pretty sweater-It runs large
items.body: Its a really pretty & super soft sweater. The blue is great color! The sizing runs extremely large. I had to return it because it was just way too big. Read more
items.author: Crissy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pills easily
items.body: Loved the sweater but after one wash it got a lot of killing on it. I bought a pill machine but really didn't do much good. Read more
items.author: Janna C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchase this sweater! You won't regret it!
items.body: This sweater is so soft and comfy! It looks great with both leggings and jeans, so you can wear it dressed up or dressed down! I love it and can't wait to purchase more colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Jersey Girl
items.body: I LOVE an oversized BEAUTIFUL sweater! Very well made, not too heavy but just right for fall and colder weather. My new favorite sweater! Read more
items.author: Solace 13

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Wine Red, White, Grey Blue, Apricot, Black, Brick Red, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
